name: Jelly Joy Journey
description:
Join in the adventure with our brand new match puzzle with all new twist.
Help Jellyfer the Princess of the candy store to match all the jellies
Explore the beautiful playground while solving challenging puzzles in our fun and addicting match game.
More than 100 fun tasty levels in this delicious mobile puzzle game, each level is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
With our brand new candy concept, we bring a breath of fresh air to the mobile match puzzle game genre.
Jelly Joy is FREE to play and you will even get extra bonuses when you unlock new features! There are also in-app purchases available, but they aren't necessary in order to play Jelly joy!
Connect to Facebook to compete with friends and help each other defeat each challenge by giving free lives.

Features:
• Fun and addicting gameplay.
• Brand new game mechanics.
• Easy and fun to play!
• Great for the whole family.
• Cute graphics that are adorable to look at.
• Lots of updates with new levels every couple of weeks.
• Connect to Facebook to compete with friends.
Follow us on Facebook to receive updates and special bonuses.
